content: [hakon] "What? You can't shove this barricade forward yourself, human?" Hakon smiles, excited by the war, the very thing at which he excels.
[$hero] By the time your caravan is inside Arberrang's outer wall, the gate is mostly compromised. Rugga's forces are on your heels, and they brought bears.
[$hero] The roar of battle swells to deafening levels. You focus on the drum beat that is your heart, ready your weapon, and push forward to deliver death.
[king] "Cut them off or they'll overrun us!" shouts King Meinolf, before wincing and grabbing his side where Rugga stabbed him.

content.option: "Horseborn! Run in and take out that bear master!"
"Hakon, can you stop them at the gate?"

content: [oddleif] Oddleif and your other archers find protected positions and more arrows are laid at their feet. She nods to you and the battle begins.
[scathach] With a shake of his mane, Scattach rushes forward. The other horseborn follow his lead.
